name: gdelectron
description: A Google Drive desktop app made with Electron

scripts.package-all: npm run package-mac && npm run package-win && npm run package-lin
scripts.package-win: electron-packager . 'Google Drive Electron' --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=static/gd.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Alex Gyujin Kim' --version-string.FileDescription='A Google Drive desktop app made with Electron.' --version-string.ProductName='Google Drive Electron'

author: Alex Gyujin Kim
